common.your-password-passphrases: The more characters your password has, the stronger it is. However, long, complex passwords can be difficult to remember. So instead, we recommend you use passphrases.
common.two-factor-authentication-is-enabled: Two-factor authentication is enabled for this account. Please enter the current code your authenticator app shows.
common.use-this-feature: Use this feature if you believe you forgot to logout on a public computer or someone might be using your account from anywhere else. Careful, everyone including you will be logged out. You will have to login again and enter your password to access the app.
common.we-recommend-using-2-factor-authenticati: We recommend using 2-factor authentication for optimal security of your account. You need to have an authenticator app on your smartphone.
common.when-not-providing-an-avatar: When not providing an avatar, we fallback to initials. The following image format are supported: png, jpg (Max. file size 5MB)
common.write-us-a-message-if-you-wish: Write us a message if you wish to close your account. We will get back to you as soon as we can to release any outstanding funds and close your account

common.scan-this-code-with-your-auth-app: Scan this code with your authenticator app (eg. Google Authenticator) on your mobile. Then enter and confirm the code.
common.the-email-is-already-used-by-another-acc: The email is already used by another account. Please log in with this email and change it from there.

common.fatca-stands: FATCA stands for the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act. The purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing US persons from using banks and other financial organisations to avoid US taxation on their income and assets.
common.fatca-desc: Annually, banks and other financial organisations are required to report information on financial accounts held directly or indirectly by US persons.

common.checked-desc: your beneficiary will receive the entered amount minus the service fee.

common.every-transaction-is-denominated-in-troy: Every transaction is denominated in Troy Ounces (ozt). Each account is 100% backed by physical gold and silver. All prices are for reference only, and are calculated based on the prevailing Gold and Silver Spot price which is subject to market fluctuations.
common.final-pricing-will-be-confirmed-upon-ful: Final pricing will be confirmed upon full payment.
common.we-operate-from-mondays-to-sundays: We operate from Mondays to Sundays, except on U.S. Public Holidays.
common.due-to-global-markets-being-close-on-wee: Due to Global Markets being closed on weekends, spreads are higher and liquidity is subject to the availability of allocated trading volumes based on a first come, first served basis.

offer.investing-in-private: Investing in private placements, tokens and early stage businesses involves a high degree of risk, including, but not limited to, illiquidity, lack of dividends, loss of investment and dilution, and those investors who cannot afford to lose their entire investment should not invest. Purchases of Tokens and similar securities are even higher risk including, but not limited to, complete loss of capital, regulatory & tax uncertainty, cyber-security attacks, Blockchain risks and no shareholder rights.
offer.we-are-targeted: We are targeted exclusively at investors who are sufficiently sophisticated to understand these risks and make their own investment decisions. You will only be able to invest via us once you are registered as sufficiently sophisticated. Investments may lose value, there are no guarantees, securities and investments are not specifically Insured and neither we, of our associated companies, offer legal or tax advice.

kyc-wizard.to-complete: To complete your account setup, please follow the steps below
kyc-wizard.step-one-desc: Please provide the information requested and keep your Proof of Identity and Proof of Address Documents ready for upload.
kyc-wizard.step-two-desc: The information provided will be reviewed for completeness and eligibility. We will notify you if we are missing any details or once your account is approved.

kyc-wizard.step-three-account-desc: Fund your account and start trading. You can also receive gold and silver directly from other account holders!
